Description: Bronze figure of an ibis, hollow-cast, with incised decoration.
Curator's comments: Published in: Regulski, I. (ed.), 2022. Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt, pp. 222-3
Exhibition history: Exhibited; 1977 London, BM, Animals in Art 2022-2023 13 Oct-19 Feb, London, BM, Hieroglyphs: unlocking ancient Egypt
Acquisition name: Donated by: Thomas Edward Lawrence (Trustees of the 'Letters' of)
Acquisition notes: According to the Register, the object was donated by the Tustees of the Letters of the late Col T E Lawrence.
